name: Dance Dance 2021: Silver Edition
description:
This game has been in development for 1 month but I finally finished it! Play through 7 songs and 5 characters to choose from, you can also play on mobile!

HOW TO PLAY:

Go to Settings, then choose a Difficulty, then hit Practice and done!

STATS:
